trans-unit.source: Makes a request to an entire <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> or to a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in a package, identified by a pack URI.
<xref:System.IO.Packaging> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] use a defined pack uri syntax to refer to parts that are contained in a package.
For more information about the abstract class that this class derives from and the operation of requests and responses, see <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.

The CachePolicy property is distinct from the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest.CachePolicy%2A> of the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref> to use with pack URI web request.
The specified <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref> to set is not valid.
Gets or sets the name of the connection group.
The ConnectionGroupName property enables the request to be associated with a connection group.
A connection group is useful when application makes requests to the same server for different users.
The ConnectionGroupName property is an empty string if the request resolves from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache.
The ConnectionGroupName property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The connection group name.
Gets or sets the `Content-length` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_http](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-http-md.md)] header.
Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
For most traditional purposes (such as estimating the size of POST information), there is no need for this property.
ContentLength returns 0 if the request resolves from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache.
The ContentLength property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The content length, in bytes.
Set is not supported, <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref> is read-only.
Gets or sets the `Content-type` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_http](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-http-md.md)] header.
Note that the pack URI protocol does not process information in the request other than the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
For most purposes (such as determining the type of POST information), there is no use for this property.
ContentType returns an empty string if the request resolves from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache.
The ContentType property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The contents of the header.
Gets or sets the authentication credentials.
Requests to the package cache use their own cached credentials.
The Credentials property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The authentication credentials to use with the request.
Gets the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>.
The GetInnerRequest is provided for advanced scenarios only and is not needed for normal operation.

A <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> created from the inner-URI if the request resolves to a valid transport protocol such http or ftp; or a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> created with a null-URI if the request resolves from the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore"></xref> cache.
The inner URI does not resolve to a valid transport protocol such as http for ftp, nor can the request be resolved from the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore"></xref>.
Do not use—GetRequestStream is not supported by <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest"></xref>.
GetRequestStream exists to implement the contract required by the abstract base class.
The pack URI protocol does not support writing.
If GetRequestStream is called, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> is thrown.
Occurs on any call to GetRequestStream.
The pack URI protocol does not support writing.
Returns the response stream for the request.
Per the signature of the base class, GetResponse returns value of type <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>.
The return value it is actually of type <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebResponse> specific to the response of the pack URI protocol.
The <xref:System.Net.WebResponse.Close%2A> method should be called when the application is finished with the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> stream.
The response stream for the request.
Gets or sets the collection of header name/value pairs associated with the request.
Package cache requests include a valid but otherwise empty header collection in their requests.
The Headers property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
A header collection object.
Gets or sets the protocol method to use with the pack URI request.
The Method property returns an empty string if the request resolves from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache.
The Method property is only set when request references an external Web request, such as http or ftp.
The Method property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The protocol method name that performs this request.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to preauthenticate the request.
The PreAuthenticate property returns `false` for requests resolved from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache; there is no pre-authentication scheme for the pack URI protocol.
The PreAuthenticate property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to send a `WWW-authenticate` [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_http](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-http-md.md)] header with the initial request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the network proxy for Internet access.
The Proxy property is shared with the inner <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The <xref href="System.Net.WebProxy"></xref> to use for Internet access.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource associated with the request.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource associated with the request.
Gets or sets the length of time before the request times out.
Requests to the package cache do not time out.
For requests that resolve from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageStore> cache, Timeout returns a value of –1.
The Timeout property is shared with the inner request (<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackWebRequest.GetInnerRequest%2A>).
The number of milliseconds to wait before the request times out.
Gets or sets the default authentication credentials.
The default authentication credentials to use with the pack URI request.
